description: Removes a source from an existing flow. This request can be made only if there is more than one source on the flow.

parameters.name: FlowArn
parameters.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the flow that you want to remove a source from.

parameters.name: SourceArn
parameters.description: The ARN of the source that you want to remove.

nested_items.name: FlowArn
nested_items.description: The ARN of the flow that the source was removed from.

nested_items.name: SourceArn
nested_items.description: The ARN of the source that was removed.
